Galjardo od decembra trener Barselone?
Tvrdi Klaudio Bordi

07 Nov 2019

Kako se povećavaju šanse da Ernesto Valverde do kraja godine dobije otkaz u Barseloni i napusti klub pre isteka ugovora koji traje do juna, tako su sve jače glasine da će ekipu posle njega preuzeti argentinski stručnjak Marselo Galjardo.
Strateg River Plejta je uz Ronalda Kumana najveća želja Barselone za mesto šefa stručnog štaba. Glasine o Galjardovom dolasku u Kataloniju je ddnaas dodatnu podgrejao argentinski trener Klaudio Borgi. Nekadašnji šampion sveta sa Gaučosima, a kasnije strateg Kolo Kola, Independijentea, Boke Juniors, reprezentacije Čilea, izjavio je danas da će Galjardo u decembru preuzeti Barselonu.“Raspolažem informacijama da će Galjardo u decembru preuzeti Barselonu. Ne mogu da navedem izvor koji mi je to otkrio, ali mogu da kažem da je jako pouzdan. Marselo je to zaslužio kao jedan od najboljih trenera sveta”, rekao je Borgi koji danas radi na jednoj televiziji kao stručni konsultant.
Njegove reči su vrlo brzo prešle Atlantik i dobile važno mesto u španskim medijima. Galjardo se još od letos pominje kao želja Barselone, a decembar bi zaista mogao da bude pravi momenat za to.
Njega 23. decembra očekuje finale Kopa Libertadores u Limi u kojem će sa Riverom braniti titulu protiv brazilskog Flamenga. Ako osvoji trofej, Galjardo bi zaista mogao da zatvori uspešnu eru na Monumentalu i pređe na sledeći iazzov. A s obzirom kako ide Valverdeu u Barseloni, njegov otkaz bi tada mogao da bude ozvaničen.
Galjardo je napravio čudo u River Plejtu za ovih pet godina na kormilu. Dva puta je osvojio Kopa Libertadores, jednom Kopa Sudamerikanu, a sada ima šansi za treći trofej kontinentalnog prvaka. Ako i po treći put pokori Južnu Ameriku, pitanje je kakav bi dalji motiv imao za ostanak u klubu gde je stekao status mita. Istina, još nema osvojenu titulu šampiona Argentine, ali poziv iz Barselone bi bio veći izazov od ostanka na Monumentalu.
Iako radi daleko od očiju evropske fudbalske javnosti, Galjardov ternerski rejting je da niko ne bi mogao da zameri Barseloni ako ga dovede. Pep Gvardiola je nedavno zapitao fudbalsku javnost zašto nema Galjarda u najužim izborima za razne nagrade koje se dodeljuju najboljim renerima godine. Gvardiola izuzetno ceni Galjardov rad u Riveru, a u Barseloni se Gvardiolino mišljenje pogotovo ceni.
Galjardov adut bi mogao da bude i Leo Mesi kojeg je klub uglavnom konsultovao kada su se birali treneri. Mesi je nedavno u izboru za trojicu najboljih trenera sveta dodelio glasove Gvardioli i zemljacima Poketinu i Galjardu. Javna je tajna da je Mesi uticao na odluku kluba pre nekoliko godina da Barsa imenuje “Tatu” Martina za glavnog trenera. Pa kad je mogao trener Martinovog pedigrea, zašto ne bi i najbolji trener Južne Amerike u poslednjih nekoliko godina…
Galjardo ima mnoge osobine poželjne za trenera Barselone. Značajno je igračko ime kao što su bili Rajkard, Gvardiola i Luis Enrike sa kojima je Barsa postizala najveće uspehe. Ima dugačko iskustvo rada u velikom klubu pod pritiskom. Profilisao se kao stručnjak za međunarodna i kup takmičenja, a to je ono za čime Barselona pati. Liga šampiona je prvi cilj Katalonaca, a u prethodne dve godine su doživljavali katastrofalna ispadanja od Rome i Liverpula. Galjardu se takvi debakli ne dešavaju. Njegov River je savršeno kontrolisao utakmice u nokaut fazama i pokazao da ume da igra na rezultat. Čak i kada je bio slabiji od protivnika.
A popularni Munjeko je po stilu pokazao da je mešavina atrakcije i pragmatizma. Ono što nedostaje Barseloni.“Galjardo je sazreo da vodi klub poput Barselone”, rekao je danas Riverov levi bek Milton Kasko, jedan od trenerovih najvernijih vojnika poslednjih godina.
Sve se crta za dolazak nekadašnje “desetke” Rivera, Monaka i Pari Sen Žermena u Kataloniju…
(FOTO: reuters)

Gallardo since December Barcelona coach?
Hardcore Claudio Bordy

07 Nov 2019

As the chances of Ernesto Valverde getting fired in Barcelona by the end of the year and leaving the club before the end of the contract, which expires by June, are growing, so rumors are growing that Argentine expert Marselo Gallardo will take over the team after him.
The River Plate strategist, with Ronald Kuman, is Barcelona's biggest wish for the post of chief of staff. Rumors of Gallardo's arrival in Catalonia have been further fueled by Argentinean coach Claudio Borgi. The former world champion with the Gauchos, and later the strategist of Colo Colo, the Independents, Boca Juniors and the Chile national team, said today that Gallardo will take over Barcelona in December. "I have information that Gallardo will take over Barcelona in December. I cannot cite the source that revealed this to me, but I can say that it is very reliable. Marselo deserves it as one of the best coaches in the world, ”said Borgi, who works as a TV consultant today.
His words crossed the Atlantic very quickly and gained an important place in the Spanish media. Gallardo has been referred to this year as Barcelona's wish, and December could really be the right moment for it.
He is awaiting the finals of the Copa Libertadores in Lima on December 23, in which he and Rivera will defend the title against Brazilian Flamengo. If he wins the trophy, Gallardo could really close the successful era at Monumental and move on to the next iazz. And given how Valverde goes to Barcelona, his dismissal could then be formalized.
Gallardo has done a miracle at River Plate for these five years at the helm. He has won the Kopa Libertadores twice, once the Kopa Sudamerican, and now has the chance of a third Continental Champion trophy. If he conquers South America for the third time, the question is what further motive would he have for remaining in the club where he was granted bribe status. True, he has not yet won the title of champion of Argentina, but an invitation from Barcelona would be more of a challenge than staying at Monumental.
Although it works far from the eyes of the European football public, Gallardo's coaching rating is that no one would blame Barcelona if he were brought. Pep Guardiola has recently asked the footballing public why there is no Gallardo in the shortlist for the various awards given to the top ranked players of the year. Guardiola greatly appreciates Gallardo's work in the River, and in Barcelona, Guardiola's opinion is particularly appreciated.
Gallardo's trump card could also be Leo Messi, whom the club mostly consulted when selecting coaches. Messi recently cast votes for Guardiola and countryman Poketin and Gallard in the selection of the top three coaches in the world. It is a public secret that Messi influenced the club's decision several years ago that Barca appoint "Dad" Martin as head coach. So if you could coach Martin's pedigree, why not get the best South American coach in the last few years ...
Gallardo has many qualities desirable for the Barcelona coach. Notable is a player's name, such as Raikard, Guardiola and Luis Enrique, with whom Barça achieved the greatest success. He has a long experience of working in a big club under pressure. He has profiled himself as an expert on international and cup competitions, which is what Barcelona is suffering from. The Champions League is the first goal of the Catalans, and in the past two years they have experienced catastrophic outbursts from Rome and Liverpool. To the gallows, such debacles do not happen. His River perfectly controlled the matches in the knockout stages and showed that he could play on the score. Even when he was weaker than his opponent.
And the popular Munjeko has shown in style to be a mixture of attraction and pragmatism. What Barcelona misses: "Gallardo has matured to run a club like Barcelona," said Rivero's left-back Milton Casco, one of Coach's most loyal soldiers in recent years, today.
Everything draws for the arrival of the former "dozens" of River, Monaco and Paris Saint-Germain in Catalonia ...
